messages.title: Only the Lib Dems will deliver real change in Reading East
messages.content: Labour can't win in Reading East. Voting for them will just help re-elect the Tory MP. Since the last election Labour has lost two-thirds of the council seats it held in the area. They are out of the race.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dem plan to cut taxes for ordinary people by closing tax loopholes exploited by the super rich.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour can't win in Reading East. Voting for them will just help re-elect the Tory MP.

leaflet.personalStatement: Gareth lives in the heart of central Reading and has a record of action.

politicalExperience.role: local resident with casework as a councillor

contactInformation.address: Return to: Reading Lib Dems FREEPOST RSKU-BLBÄ-HZEB 12 St John’s Road, Reading RG1 4EB
